entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Sudbury (Greater)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:09 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning this afternoon. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
